age.Description: Age of participant at time of experiment

meal_order.Description: Devaluation meal across the three sessions (Session1-Session2-Session3). Alternates from the initial meal unless overridden by subject-specific notes.

Levels.Sweet-Savory-Sweet: Sweet devalued in Sessions 1 & 3, Savory in Session 2
Levels.Savory-Sweet-Savory: Savory devalued in Sessions 1 & 3, Sweet in Session 2
Levels.Sweet-Sweet-Savory: Special case (e.g., NODEAP_44): Sweet in Sessions 1 & 2, Savory in Session 3

tms_order.Description: TMS condition per session pair (D1+D2) across Session1-Session2-Session3, using C=cTBS and S=sham (e.g., 'CS-SC-SS').

Levels.CS-SC-SS: S1: cTBS+sham, S2: sham+cTBS, S3: sham+sham
Levels.CS-SS-SC: S1: cTBS+sham, S2: sham+sham, S3: sham+cTBS
Levels.SC-CS-SS: S1: sham+cTBS, S2: cTBS+sham, S3: sham+sham
Levels.SC-SS-CS: S1: sham+cTBS, S2: sham+sham, S3: cTBS+sham
Levels.SS-CS-SC: S1: sham+sham, S2: cTBS+sham, S3: sham+cTBS
Levels.SS-SC-CS: S1: sham+sham, S2: sham+cTBS, S3: cTBS+sham
